# [Interview #403: AOL Chat 2, Entry #90](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=403#90)

#### Question

Why is Perrin's horse in
*Lord of Chaos*
called Stayer and not Stepper?

#### Robert Jordan

Because it's a different horse.
